channel.title: [PI][317]Need help with Cache Downloader
channel.description:
Hey I'm new to coding and I'm having problems with my cache downloader/unzipper etc. Basically, it's not downloading and unzipping properly, the uploaded cache is correct but when it downloads via the client it messes up and some files aren't downloaded/unzipped.
[CODE]Downloading Cache 100% ErasedPkzcache1.zip 71494208 Finished downloading ErasedPkzcache1.zip! java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache1\ErasedPkzcache1\cacheVersion1. dat (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:192) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:178) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:81) at client.startUp(client.java:8753) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) UNZIP java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache1\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:80) at client.startUp(client.java:8754) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache1\ErasedPkzcache1\cacheVersion1. dat (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:66) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4742) at client.startUp(client.java:8764) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE]
I don't know what's wrong because when I download the cache via my browser the missing files ARE in it but when I download via the client some files are missing, any idea what could be wrong?

item.title: [PI][317]Need help with Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @thewhistler8 thewhistler8
item.description:
@thewhistler8 wrote:

Hey I’m new to coding and I’m having problems with my cache downloader/unzipper etc. Basically, it’s not downloading and unzipping properly, the uploaded cache is correct but when it downloads via the client it messes up and some files aren’t downloaded/unzipped.

Downloading Cache 100% ErasedPkzcache1.zip 71494208 Finished downloading ErasedPkzcache1.zip! java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache1\ErasedPkzcache1\cacheVersion1. dat (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:192) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:178) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:81) at client.startUp(client.java:8753) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) UNZIP java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache1\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:80) at client.startUp(client.java:8754) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache1\ErasedPkzcache1\cacheVersion1. dat (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:66) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4742) at client.startUp(client.java:8764) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I don’t know what’s wrong because when I download the cache via my browser the missing files ARE in it but when I download via the client some files are missing, any idea what could be wrong?
